definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: :Je 48:41 fastness, stronghold (prop. hunting-place?);—abs. [[מְחָד]] 1Ch 11:7, 1Ch 12:16, [[מְחַד]] 1Ch 12:8; pl. abs. [[מְחָדוֹת]] 1Sa 23:14+, cstr. id. v:1Sa 23:29 (Gi, 24:1 van d. H. Baer), Is 33:16; —
mounting-fastness Ju Jdg 6:2, 1Sa 23:14, 1Sa 23:19, 1Sa 23:29 (v. supr.), Ez Eze 33:27, 1Ch 12:8, 1Ch 12:16; [[מְחָדוֹת סְלָעִים]] Is 33:16.

more gen., stronghold Je 48:41, Je 51:30, Ez Eze 19:9 (Baer Gi; van d. H. [[מְחׂדוֹת]] id. [II. [[מְחוֹדָה]]] Ew Hi-Sm Da al.; nets [1. [[מְחוֹדָה]]] Krae; del. Co Oort Toy); citadel of Jerusalem 1Ch 11:7.
